description.lang: The Aeotec by Aeon Labs Recessed Door Sensor Gen5 is a door sensor that can detect the state of the door's open/close. It will report the door state to your controller/ gateway/associated nodes in real time when the state of your door has a change. Its a security Z-Wave device that supports security encryption. Also it supports the Over the Air Firmware Updating that allows you wirelessly update its firmware if needs. It can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from manufacturers and/or other applications.
Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.The Basic Set CC or Sensor Binary report CC will be sent to the associated nodes in Group 1.

name.lang: Which value of the Sensor Binary Report will be sent when the magnet switch to open/close.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the Sensor binary report value when the magnet switch to open/close.
When the magnet switch to open, Sensor Binary Report=0xFF. When the magnet switch to close, Sensor Binary Report=0x00.
When the magnet switch to open, Sensor Binary Report=0x00. When the magnet switch to close, Sensor Binary Report=0xFF.

name.lang: Enable/disable the function of low battery checking

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure to enable/disable the function of low battery checking.(00==Disable, 1==Enable).
Disable low battery checking.
Enable low battery checking.

name.lang: The interval time of low battery checking.

description.lang: This parameter is used to configure the interval time of low battery checking.Note: 1. The minimum unit of interval time is 4 minutes(240). If the value is set to 1 minute, the interval time will be 4 minutes. The same is if the value is set to 7 minutes, the interval time will be 8 minutes. 2. The possible values are unsigned value, so its range is 0 to 2147483647.
The range of interval time is 0 to 2147483647.

name.lang: To set which command will be sent to the associated nodes when the magnet switch is triggered.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set which command will be sent to the associated nodes when the magnet switch is triggered.
Send the Sensor Binary Report and Basic Set to associated nodes when magnet switch is triggered.
Send Sensor Binary Report to associated nodes when magnet switch is triggered.
Send Basic Set to associated nodes when magnet switch is triggered.

name.lang: Enable/disable all configuration parameters to be locked

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable all configuration parameters to be locked.(0 =disable, 1 = enable)
Disable all configuration parameters to be locked.
Enable all configuration parameters to be locked.
This parameter is used to set the device tag.Note: The possible values are unsigned value, its range is 0 to 65535.
The range of device tag is 65535.

name.lang: Which value of the Basic Set will be sent when the magnet switch to open/close.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the Basic Set value when the magnet switch to open/close.
When the magnet switch to open, Basic Set=0x00. When the magnet switch to close, Basic Set=0xFF.
When the magnet switch to open, Basic Set=0xFF. When the magnet switch to close, Basic Set=0x00.
